verses.verse: I hate and abhor lying, But I love Your law.
Seven times a day I praise You, Because of Your righteous judgments.
(1 Sam. 24:11; 26:18) Great peace have those who love Your law, And nothing causes them to stumble.
(Prov. 3:2; (Is. 26:3; 32:17)) LORD, I hope for Your salvation, And I do Your commandments.
My soul keeps Your testimonies, And I love them exceedingly.
I keep Your precepts and Your testimonies, (Gen. 49:18) For all my ways are before You.
(×ª TAU) Let my cry come before You, O LORD; (Job 24:23; Prov. 5:21) Give me understanding according to Your word.
